overview: When Ty Thomas hires Markie More to bareback his boyfriend Jake Davis on his birthday, he watches the sexual encounter and loses his load. Dick for hire Markie More gets a callback from client Ty Thomas the day after he hires him to fuck his boyfriend for his birthday. When Dante Martin catches his boyfriend Paul Canon cheating with Damian Black, the couple agrees to have a threesome instead of a fight. Tryster Dalton Riley sweet talks his boyfriend into staying home for make up sex when he threatens to leave him for cheating.
title: Bareback My Boyfriend
